Medium: A (no. 1): Cover with letterpress photomontage illustration on front; letterpress photographic illustrations by Aleksandr Rodchenko, Sergei Tret'iakov, and others, and letterpress illustrations by V. Kozlinskii, A. Breia, A. Radakova, and Evg. Mandel'berg.
